'''Emma''' is one of the students of [[Madeleine Skurski]] who visited her in the hospital.

==History==
She is in Ms. Skurski's math and science class. When Ms. Skurski became ill, Emma, [[Lucas]], and [[Adam]] skipped their after-school study session to see her. They then returned with the rest of their class, which is when Ms. Skurski broke the news that she wouldn't be returning to school.

==Relationships==
===Professional===
She loves her teacher, Ms. Skurski. When Ms. Skurski got sick and Mr. Arnold replaced her, she came to the hospital to see Ms. Skurski.
